      LoggingDeserializer.DelayedResult<T> tryDeserialize(java.lang.String topic, byte[] bytes)
      Similar to deserialize(String, byte[]), but allows the erroneous case to delay the log-and-throw behavior until LoggingDeserializer.DelayedResult.get() is called.

      • tryDeserialize

        public LoggingDeserializer.DelayedResult<T> tryDeserialize(java.lang.String topic,
                                                           byte[] bytes)
        Similar to deserialize(String, byte[]), but allows the erroneous case to delay the log-and-throw behavior until LoggingDeserializer.DelayedResult.get() is called.

        This can be used in the scenarios when an error is expected, such as if a retry will likely solve the problem, to avoid spamming the processing logger with messages that are not helpful to the end user.

      • close

        public void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:

        Specified by:
        close in interface org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Deserializer<T>
